function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Collection and analysis of environmental covariates for each trail segment may lead to exposure to outdoor contaminants and pathogens.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of dsm and dtm data provided by the norwegian mapping authority may lead to potential data privacy and security risks if not handled appropriately.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of google earth engine gee cloud computing platform may pose data security and privacy risks if adequate safeguards are not implemented.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing activity levels during lockdown to baseline may not account for the impact of abnormal weather variations on recreational activity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deviation in recreational activity levels during lockdown may not align with predicted levels based on weather conditions, leading to inaccurate assessments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for spatial covariates and their impact on recreational activity assessment during lockdown.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calibrated activity count a may not accurately represent the actual number of people frequenting a street segment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anonymized mobility data may compromise individual privacy and data security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users, potentially skewing the results.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of relative estimates into absolute activity numbers may introduce errors due to calibration and sampling limitations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detrending the time series data to account for the long-term trend in strava data may oversimplify the analysis and mask important variations in activity patterns.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large number of people using outdoor recreational infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Advising individuals in quarantine to recreate outdoors with no range limitation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Substantial user base in norway for strava with recording of outdoor activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in recreational activity due to lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preference for green views leading to increased recreational activity","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in recreational use on remote trails due to social distancing advisories","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of public green spaces during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unemployment due to covid-19-related furlough","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in daily schedules and work-life balance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sar-cov-2 in densely populated urban areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence for the role of urban nature in pandemic resilience","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks associated with increased demand for recreational activity in green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uso de redes sociales para comunicar medidas gubernamentales durante la pandemia.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difusión de noticias falsas e información poco rigurosa","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uso de memes para difundir mensajes relacionados con la pandemia.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relacionar personajes populares con mensajes sobre la pandemia.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Desconfianza en los políticos por favoritismos en la entrega de bonos.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Estereotipos de género asociados a la distribución de roles en la sociedad durante la pandemia.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impacto positivo en el medio ambiente durante la pandemia y reflexión sobre el consumo.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"La sobreexposición a información exagerada sobre covid-19 en las redes sociales","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exacerbación de rasgos negativos en las redes sociales durante la pandemia","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uso inadecuado de las redes sociales durante la pandemic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"La difusión rápida de información errónea a través de las redes sociales durante brotes de enfermedades","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Efectos negativos de las redes sociales en la pandemia del covid19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"La infodemia en las redes sociales, que difunde información poco rigurosa y contribuye a sentimientos de paranoia y miedo.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uso libertino e irresponsable de las redes sociales generando pánico y jugando en contra de la lucha contra la pandemia.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Necesidad de fortalecer y expandir las redes sociales para evitar morbilidad y mortalidad humanas durante crisis.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting observational studies during a pandemic may pose a risk of exposure to the virus for researchers and participants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of public databases and access to information about contagious diseases may lead to the inadvertent spread of misinformation or panic through social media.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comunicación inefectiva en redes sociales respecto a la situación de la pandemia","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Desacuerdo y polarización en redes sociales sobre las acciones de las autoridades","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uso indebido de las redes sociales para difundir teorías conspirativas sobre la pandemia","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disseminação de informações falsas e receitas médicas não comprovadas através das redes sociais","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Maior propagação do pânico e ansiedade devido a conteúdo alarmista","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Desconfiança nas medidas governamentais devido às publicações falsas e alarmistas","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of false information and unproven remedies through social networks","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of panic-inducing content on social networks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective communication of official guidelines and measures on social networks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
